long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: OnlyFilter scans & removes OnlyFans and other adult content on Twitter/X for you. Get rid of OnlyFans, Fansly, cam girls and any other meaningless posts and replies using this extension. The extension has default tags that it monitors in the background but also allows you to add more tags, names and even Twitter/X user handles to be monitored and removed on twitter. With OnlyFilter extension, you have absolute total control of your Twitter/X experience.
